posts.title: Welcome to the new blog
posts.body: Its me, Mr. Dip Akand here to help you with your Vue.js journey and beyond. I am a full stack developer and I love to share my knowledge with you. I hope you will find this blog helpful. I will be posting about Vue.js, JavaScript, CSS, HTML, and other web development topics. I will also be sharing my personal experiences and tips on how to become a better developer.

posts.title: How to create a Vue.js component
posts.body: In this post, I will show you how to create a Vue.js component. A component is a reusable piece of code that can be used in multiple places in your application. Components are the building blocks of a Vue.js application. They allow you to break your application into smaller, more manageable pieces.
